full_summary:
**Application Canceled**

**Title:** HVAC-R Maintenance, Repair and Component Replacement

**Reference Number:** 21820-23-0075

**Publication Date:** December 7, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** January 17, 2024, 5:00 PM EST

**Contract Details:**

* **Description of Requirement:**
The Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement for a qualified HVAC services contractor to perform maintenance, repairs, and component replacement services for institutional air conditioning and refrigeration systems.
* **Contract Period:**
January 29, 2024 to January 28, 2027
* **Objective:**
Provide emergency and non-emergency repairs, major component replacement, leak testing, and planned preventative maintenance to various air conditioning and refrigeration systems within a federal institution.

**Selection Criteria:**

* **Evaluation Method:**
Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**

* **Applicable Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Notes to Bidders:**

* **Documents Available:**
Please visit the BuyandSell.gc.ca website to access the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria.
* **Debriefing:**
 Suppliers may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days of receipt of the results.

**Contact Information:**

* **Contracting Authority:** Hersh Minhas
Telephone: (236) 380-0993
Email: Hersh.Minhas@csc-scc.gc.ca
Note: The information provided is a summary and may not include all details. Suppliers are responsible for reviewing and adhering to the complete solicitation documentation. 
Please ensure to check the Buy and Sell.gc.ca website for up-to-date and accurate information on the tender. 

To be considered for this project, the most relevant qualifications and experience will be examined by the evaluation team. Experience with similar projects in connection to government institutions and a strong understanding of government rules, regulations and laws will be essential for a successful bid.

The requirements and contract details may be found on the 
[Buy and Sell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/) authored by the government of Canada.
